wikipedia_page.main: James Alexander Campbell  (1825 – 9 May 1908) was a Scottish businessman and Conservative politician.

response: Henry's older brother, James Alexander Campbell, served as the Conservative Member of Parliament for Glasgow and Aberdeen Universities from 1880 to 1906 and had inherited their father's Stracathro 4000acre estate in 1876. CB had already served 12 years as an MP when his elder brother was elected.
* James Alexander Campbell (politician) (1825–1908), Scottish MP for Glasgow and Aberdeen Universities and Privy Councillor
